incident_details: Teenager arrested for making threats towards the school, which uncovered additional criminal activity
Student made a bomb threat and law enforcement was notified by the FBI about the bomb threat
Student threatened other students during a verbal argument
Student made a threat on social media and it was shared with other students
School learned about concerning posts on social media, leading to the school to seek additional police presence. Social Media page was taken down.
School received a bomb threat the first day after returning from Holiday Break
Social Media user made threats to 14 schools in Texas, 3 of which were elementary schools in the Austin ISD. The threat included a photo of a masked person with a gun.
Female Student reported that a boy made a threat referencing a firearm.
charges: Criminal Threat and Aggravated Criminal Threat

incident_details: Parents went to police and told them their daughter was showing warning signs of potentially hurting herself and others by committing a school shooting. During the investigation, police found out she dressed up as a school shooter for Halloween, researched school shootings, and a lot of references to Columbine. She felt like she could relate to Columbine shooter Eric Harris. She had multiple pictures of the Columbine shooters on her phone. Learned that she was planning to do a shooting with a transgender male named Nathan, recorded a video of the school to show how they could get in and out, and agreed upon 5/25/26 being the date of the school shooting.
charges: Attempted Murder, Conspiracy to Commit Murder, and Intimidation

incident_details: Student of the school posted a photo of herself with the caption, "i'm abt to shoot up this school" and "they done pissed me tf off". Said she posted it in frustration after she got a dress code violation.
charges: Written threats to commit a mass shooting

incident_details: Video depicted a man wearing a yellow hockey mask, holding a pistol, and in front of a Nazi Flag saying, "Many people will die. We will kill in everyway possible: shooting, bombing, cutting. We will be as cruel as possible. Person used a voice-distortion filter and claimed to belong to a group called ENDTEX. Video originated outside the U.S.
Bomb threat forces school closure and was reported that multiple schools received a bomb threat
Juvenile made a threat on Discord to harm students and staff. Juvenile lived in a different county
School received an email that made a bomb and shooting threat
School found a written threat of violence in a restroom
School received a call indicating there were bombs on campus
Expelled student showed up to school and threatened a student with a knife.
charges: Second-degree assault, making death threats, trespassing, disruption of school activities, and weapons on school property

incident_details: Student reported hearing a threat on campus. Update provide mentioned the student heard about a possible weapon on campus
Reported threat determined to be not credible and to have originated outside of the United States. Connected to another Texas incident above.
Suspect called the school while under the influence of alcohol and threatened physical violence against a staff member
charges: Criminal Threat, Harassment by Telecommunication Device, and Battery of a Law Enforcement Officer
Making a terroristic threat, disorderly conduct- threat of violence on or at school property, disorderly conduct- reporting a false alarm or complaint via 911

incident_details: School received a threat via phone call, prompting a hard lockdown at multiple Yuba County Schools
precautions: Deputy stationed at each campus for the remainder of the day

school: Gates Chili Central and East Irondequoit Central School Districts
incident_details: Students reported seeing a video on TikTok where vague threats were made to multiple county schools across New York. The video originated out of Texas.
Police received information that a student brandished a firearm outside the school. Student was arrested after he fabricated the story for attention.
charges: Issuing a false alarm or police report

incident_details: Juvenile sent a threat directed towards the middle school and claimed it was a joke
The following message was found on the bathroom wall: "I am going to bomb this school"
School went into lockdown after receiving a tip about a possible threat. School determined it was a hoax and conducted a controlled dismissal.

Caller contacted the school claiming to be outside with a rifle and threatening to assault staff and students. Call was trace to Florida, as the suspect used a Google Voice Number that was tied to an IP in the state.
precautions: Sheriff's Deputy remained stationed at the school for the day
charges: False report concerning planting a bomb, an explosive, or a weapon of mass destruction, or concerning the use of firearms in a violent manner and unlawful use of a two-way communication device

incident_details: Someone called and said they had been notified that a student intended to bring a weapon to school

classes_cancelled: Classes cancelled and all campus activities cancelled

incident_details: Nearly half a dozen schools received an AI generated phone call that made a bomb threat. It targeted primarily private and charter schools.

Posts alleged violence towards the school but was determined to be a video that is several years old.
Student reported seeing a threat on Instagram from an unknown account.
charges: Threats and Interference with or disruption of an educational institution

incident_details: Student wrote in a notebook threats directed towards other students. Student wrote the statements based on a TV Show he had seen.

incident_details: Bomb Threat in which law enforcement stated that they thought it may have been AI.
